PaySuperChangePassword.title: Password Reset
PaySuperChangePassword.subtitle: We will send you an email with reset code.

The password must contain at least 6 characters, including
latin letters and at least one digit.
PaySuperChangePassword.completeSubtitle: You may log in now with your new password.

PaySuperRegisterForm.title: Sign Up
PaySuperRegisterForm.subtitle: Hi, we are glad you were able to join us.
PaySuperRegisterForm.info: The password must contain at least 6 characters, including latin letters and at least one digit and one uppercase letter.
